text: Kakkakarumban is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by MA Venu, starring Sidharth Bharathan and Meenakshi in the lead role. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/1526/malayalam/kakkakarumban/index.htm ==Cast== * Meenakshi * Sidharth Bharathan * Bindu Ramakrishnan * Ambika Mohan * Nedumudi Venu * Jagathi Sreekumar * Ponnamma Babu *Harisree Ashokan *Kochu Preman *Saikumar *Sudheesh *Riyas Khan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kakkakarumban
